name: Happy Yak Mediterranean Pork
description: Savoury pieces of brazed pork in fluffy couscous, laced with vegetable and brought to life with green and black olives, this meal will have visions of Santorini invading your camp kitchen.Ingredients: couscous (wheat), freeze-dried pork (pork, onion, spices), dehydrated vegetables (green olive, black olive, onion, tomato flakes, carrot, potato, celery, leek, green and red bell peppers), dehydrated prunes (sulphites), vegetable broth powder (maltodextrin, yeast extract, dehydrated vegetables (tomato, onion, garlic), salt, modified corn starch, spices, sugar, hydrogenated soy oil, caramel, citric acid, guar gum, xanthan gum), brown sugar, garlic powder, spices, dried herbs.May contain: nuts, peanuts, sesame, milk, egg, seafood, mustard.
